metrics.name: Contracted_ARR
formulae: metrics.Contracted_ARR[t=t] = metrics.Contracted_ARR[t=t-1] + metrics.New_Logo_ARR[t=t] + metrics.Cross_Upsell_ARR[t=t] + metrics.Scaleup_ARR[t=t] - metrics.Churn_ARR[t=t]

metrics.name: Old_Pending_Go_Live_Billing_ARR
metrics.display_name: Old Pending Go Live Billing ARR

metrics.name: GA_Total
formulae: metrics.GA_Total = metrics.GA_Office_Expense + metrics.GA_Sim_Expenses + metrics.GA_Legal_Professional_Charges + metrics.GA_Insurance + metrics.GA_Employee_Welfare + metrics.GA_Celebtrations + metrics.GA_Expat_Cost_Visa_Immigration + metrics.GA_Rent + metrics.GA_New_Office_Rent + metrics.GA_Office_Security + metrics.GA_Compliance_Training + metrics.GA_New_Office_Additional_Expense + metrics.GA_Employer_Branding + metrics.GA_Employee_Rewards + metrics.GA_Learning_Training + metrics.GA_Ta_Recruitment_Effort + metrics.GA_Social_Security_Taxes_Overseas

metrics.name: Employee_Cost
formulae: metrics.Employee_Cost = metrics.Salary_Total + metrics.Recruitment_Charge + metrics.Incentive + metrics.Off_Roll_Employee + metrics.Software + metrics.Travel

metrics.name: Total_COGS
formulae: metrics.Total_COGS = metrics.Server + metrics.DevOps_Software + metrics.DevOps_Team + metrics.Support + metrics.Customer_Success

metrics.name: CAC
formulae: metrics.CAC = metrics.Sales + metrics.Partner + metrics.Presales + metrics.Business_Development + metrics.Marketing

metrics.name: Total_Other_Expenses
formulae: metrics.Total_Other_Expenses = metrics.CXO + metrics.HR_Admin + metrics.TA_LD + metrics.OD + metrics.Accounts_Finance + metrics.GA

metrics.name: Total_Expense_Net_Of_PS_Revenue
formulae: metrics.Total_Expense_Net_Of_PS_Revenue = metrics.Total_COGS + metrics.Total_RD_Cost + metrics.CAC + metrics.Total_Implementation_Cost + metrics.Depreciation + metrics.ESOPs + metrics.Gratuity + metrics.Total_Other_Expenses
metrics.display_name: Total Expense Net Of PS Revenue

metrics.name: Total_Salary_New_Hire_Development_Infrastructure_Management_P
metrics.display_name: Total Salary New Hire Development Infrastructure Management P

metrics.name: Employee_Cost_Process_HR_Admin_P
metrics.display_name: Employee Cost Process HR Admin P

metrics.name: Employee_Cost_Process_TA_LD_P
metrics.display_name: Employee Cost Process TA LD P

metrics.name: Employee_Cost_Process_Accounts_Finance_P
metrics.display_name: Employee Cost Process Accounts Finance P

metrics.name: Deals_Won
metrics.description: Deals that are marked as Closed Won in a quarter/month

metrics.name: Deals_Lost
metrics.description: Deals that are marked as Closed Lost in a quarter/month
